Name: Searing Prowler
Desc: A machine unit prowling in the Fragmentum. Undoubtedly, this monstrosity is not a human creation, but one that was born out of the perversion of the Fragmentum.\nSearing Prowler's attacks will deal extra damage against enemies afflicted with Burn.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Burn the target.
Deals Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target. This attack prioritizes targets afflicted with Burn.
After attacking a Burned target, receives a DMG increase.
Slightly increases ATK and greatly increases SPD. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.
Deals Fire DMG to all targets. Targets suffering from Burn are dealt an extra Fire DMG and have Burn removed.
Deals Fire DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Burn the target.
